EmailTemplate.subject: Security Notice 5th March, 2012
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Parents,
1. ***Security Notice Today (5th March, 2012):-
It has come to our attention that another demonstration permit has been issued for March 5th at 19:00pm.
The permit is for 50,000 people at Pushkinskaya.
A large police presence is expected with possible road closures starting around 17:00pm.
ISM Faculty and Staff are advised to find an alternative route home and to avoid the Tverskaya area.
Gruzinsky Street and Kutuzovsky Prospect are the most likely areas to be affected.
2. ***Wine Tasting Event:-
Just a quick reminder of the outline for the evening of the wine tasting event. The deadline date for confirmation and payment is 9th March. If you are interested please let me know as soon as possible.
LA GRANDE CAVE PROPOSAL 24th MARCH
(Grünwald,RublevskoeShosse 30/1)
• 18.30 Welcome Drink (sparkling wine and some canapés)
• 19.00-19.30 Excursion in the wine cellar (in different groups)
• 19.30-20.15 Wine tasting; 4 wines (4 reds, or 2 red and 2 whites)
• 20.15-(time to be agreed) Dinner - Fourchette (menu to be agreed upon, wine and soft drinks)
There will also have bottles of Polugar (Russian distillate) for the end of the evening.
Any purchases made during the evening will have a 10% discount.
The cost of the evening will be 4500 RUB per person.
Please be aware that there will be a limit to the number of people that will be able to attend, so as to make sure that everyone can enjoy the evening as best a possible, therefore it will strictly be first come first served.
I will need payment of 4500 RUB per person by no later than 9th March; this will confirm your attendance. 50% of what is collected will be used as a deposit on this date. If by any chance you won't be able to attend youwill be refunded 2250 RUB. The deadline for the final payment will be 20th March, so please make sure you let me know if you won't be able to attend by this date.
Method of payment:
Please bring an envelope with the exact money (no change will be available), your name and that of your +1 (if attending) and the event name (Wine Tasting) to the Admissions office on the Upper Campus. If you do not have to stop by the UC, please give your envelope to Zarina Abdulazizova from the Accounts department on the Lower Campus.
If you need any clarification on any of this please feel free to get in touch with me.
Kind Regards
Dino Vikas Head of Admissions The International School of Moscow Tel: +7 (499) 922 44 00 Fax: +7 (499) 922 44 00 Ext.4 www.internationalschool.ru Part of The British Schools Group
